comments:
I'm connected to a local FTP server driven by FileZilla 0.9.18 beta.
I uploaded a 3MB large PDF file.
In the middle of the dir listing (which contains about 20 files), I see 1 node
  "Expand failed. Try again"

In the PDE Error Log, I see the following exception:
java.lang.NullPointerException

Not reproduced uploading an 11MB file to a folder containing 1900 files using FileZilla 0.9.8b.
Could it be something related with the name of the missing file ?
Has it happened again or could be something fixed by any other bug fixing ?
Marked as fixed since it doesn't seem to be reproduced anymore.
